name: Python Tutorials
body:
## The schedule:

| Date              | Time                               | Tutorial        | Presenter        |
|-------------------|------------------------------------|-----------------|------------------|
| Sunday, Feb 23    | 10:30am - 12:00pm 2:00pm - 3:30 pm | Basics          | Tareq            |
| Monday, Feb 24    | 10:30am - 12:00pm 2:00pm - 3:30 pm | Intermediate    | Tareq & Yiannis  |
| Wednesday, Feb 26 | 10:30am - 12:00pm 2:00pm - 3:30 pm | Advanced        | Maruan & Yiannis |
| Thursday, Feb 27  | 2:00pm - 4:00pm                    | MPI with Python | Lisandro         |

## Python Tutorials: Day 1 - Basics

This is a beginners' level session, in which we focus on the basic syntax of the language and essential functionality.
Using ipython pre-prepared notebooks, thanks to Tareq Malas, we will follow a hands on approach of understanding the 
different syntax features and to go to other sites for further details on usage.


## Python Tutorials: Day 2 - Intermediate topics
Numerics' level session

In this Numeric's level sesion we focus here on two special packages in python: Numpy and Matplotlib.
These two libraries are especially useful for Numerical Linear Algebra and for plotting.
Using ipython pre-prepared notebooks, thanks to Prof. Ketcheson and Yiannis Hadjimichael, we follow a hands on approach 
to understanding the different features and functionality of these packages and provide useful links for further details 
on usage.
